source.instructions:
Using the `checkWall()` function and some conditional statements, get your player to the exit.

Your function should react to any key on the keyboard being pressed, whether arrows or not. 

You have to escape by writing code and you're not allowed to use the `player.setX()` or `player.setY()` functions. You are allowed to use `player.moveUp()` type functions though.

You can create a really simply solution that works just for this fixed maze. We will look at more challenging mazes later.
source.name: Artificial Intelligence

source.instructions:
Take a look at the maze on the left. Your job is to somehow get the player to the exit by cheating with some code.

You will need to write code so that when the 'C' key is pressed, you escape using the `player.setX()` and `player.setY()` methods.

Take a look at the previous page for a clue.

The arrow keys work still, but you are walled in!!
source.name: Escape
